channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
i need help making compiler work... please help me out step by step or with a code... and tell me what i need to add i have jdk 6 . 07 and 05 updates...
and when i try to compile with mine it always says
javac: file not found: *.java usage: javac (options) (source files) plz help me fix this [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2008, 04:52:04 pm[/size][hr]for real someone help me plz so i can get started on editing and adding stuff to my server =(

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @balla balla
item.description:
@balla wrote:

still says same thing lol

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @sp4rkz sp4rkz
item.description:
@sp4rkz wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

There.

Read full topic
